channel.title: Help with a command
channel.description:
Can any one tell me what i have to do to make a command to make someone talk [code] FusionLord: Hello, do you want to see something cool <victom>: sure FusionLord: ::talkthrough <victom> Hello everyone i am new to Fusionscape <victom>: Hello everyone i am new to Fusionscape [/code] i would like the command to be
::talkthrough
-Thankyou, FusionLord

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I am very tempted to see if this works…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

it has com to my attition that this only shows whether the person is online and wont make them talk[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:6, topic:255649”]if(command.startsWith("talkthrough") && playerRights >= 2) { try { String[] args = command.split("_", 3); int pid = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(args[1]); if(pid == -1) { sendMessage(args[1]+" is not online."); return; } client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[pid]; c.txt4 = "~"+args[2]; // The ~ at the start makes the text appear in the chatbox. c.string4UpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Usage: ::talkthrough_playerName_text"); } } [/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("talkthrough") && playerRights >= 2) { try { String[] args = command.split("_", 3); int pid = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(args[1]); if(pid == -1) { sendMessage(args[1]+" is not online."); return; } client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[pid]; c.txt4 = "~"+args[2]; // The ~ at the start makes the text appear in the chatbox. c.string4UpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Usage: ::talkthrough_playerName_text"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

[quote=“Jeremy368, post:4, topic:255649”]What (s)he Means is typing in a command that a admin would type to make someone else say something for example

Ricky james the admin would type this
“::talkthough jeremy hi”
Then me the victim would say this
“hi”
Basically he wants to be able to make other people say what he wants when ever he wants[/quote]
this is exatly what i mean but i though i explained it very well in my post

Read full topic

What (s)he Means is typing in a command that a admin would type to make someone else say something for example

Ricky james the admin would type this

Then me the victim would say this

Basically he wants to be able to make other people say what he wants when ever he wants

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

Can any one tell me what i have to do to make a command to make someone talk

FusionLord: Hello, do you want to see something cool
<victom>: sure
FusionLord: ::talkthrough <victom> Hello everyone i am new to Fusionscape
<victom>: Hello everyone i am new to Fusionscape

i would like the command to be

::talkthrough

 -Thankyou, FusionLord

Read full topic
